revised_title: Improved Convergence and Simplification in the Orthogonalized Plane Wave Method for Band Structure Calculations
tldr: The authors discuss the orthogonalized plane wave method for calculating band structures in solids, focusing on the convergence and simplification of the method. They propose a particular choice of atomic-like functions that leads to better convergence and a more straightforward formulation of the method, making it more useful for band structure calculations.
